title: Untitled
medium: charcoal, ink and pencil on paper
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Rinaldo Paluzzi [1927-2013]; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1962 until April 1967 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased from the 1962 Paluzzi exhibition at the Westmoreland County Museum of Art (see Mrs. Beal's notes on a list dated March 1, 1966 in curatorial file.) The drawing was accessioned by the museum on April 11, 1967.

creator.death_place: Madrid, (Madrid province, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain)
